name: T20 Group
description:
At T20 our team of thinkers, designers and writers work with a synergistic approach. This allows us to provide complete solutions across: Strategy Consulting & Planning; Cross Platform Advertising; Digital Planning, Creative & Build; Graphic Design & Identity Systems; and Public Relations. We undertake this approach with a mature outlook, as we believe long-term brand equity can only be achieved through long-term thinking.
Over the past ten years weâ€™ve seen our clients increase their business; grow their company and their profile: Thirsty Camel is now one of the best-known bottle-shops around; Big Freeze at the G raised $2.4m for the MND Foundation; and Simonds is now ASX listed, in four states and a clear leader in Victoria.
